mapper.sql: edu_video_upload.id, edu_video_upload.title, edu_video_upload.video_url, edu_video_upload.classifyOne, edu_video_upload.classifyTwo, edu_video_upload.info, edu_video_upload.create_time, edu_video_upload.update_time, edu_video_upload.status, edu_video_upload.size
mapper.update: UPDATE edu_video_upload SET status=1 WHERE id in (${value})
mapper.select:
SELECT , classsifyOne.name as classifyOneName, classsifyTwo.name as classifyTwoName FROM edu_video_upload left join edu_video_classify as classsifyOne on classsifyOne.id=edu_video_upload.classifyOne left join edu_video_classify as classsifyTwo on classsifyTwo.id=edu_video_upload.classifyTwo WHERE edu_video_upload.status=0
and edu_video_upload.create_time >=concat( #{e.startTime},'00:00:00')
and edu_video_upload.create_time <=concat( #{e.endTime},'23:59:59')
and edu_video_upload.classifyOne = #{e.classifyOne}
and edu_video_upload.classifyTwo = #{e.classifyTwo}
and edu_video_upload.title like CONCAT('%',#{e.title},'%')
ORDER BY edu_video_upload.create_time DESC
